message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your initial offer was a bit imbalanced. I propose a more equitable 55-45 split.
I can meet you halfway between our previous offers, 57.5-42.5 is a fair compromise.
Time is ticking, Alice. I'm moving closer to your offer, but we need to settle this soon.
I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. 56.25-43.75 is my new offer.
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to losing it all. I'm offering a slight concession to close this deal. Let's be reasonable.
